prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies darkness and has striking red and black features.
Imagine a powerful flying creature with majestic wings and a fierce appearance.
Generate a legendary Pokemon that represents life and destruction with a unique color palette.
Design a dark-type Pokemon with an imposing figure and captivating wing designs.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of both darkness and flight with rich colors.
Give me a flying Pokemon that has a dramatic silhouette and intense red accents.
Make a Pokemon that looks both fearsome and majestic, with deep colors and elaborate wings.
